alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 21 at 9:36PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 330 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 936 PM MST, Gauge reports river rises in the Beaver Dam Wash with over 5 foot rises as CR91 near Littlefield. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Beaver Dam and Littlefield. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
